validations.tooShort: Please lengthen this text to {minLength} characters or more (you are currently using 1 character) | Please lengthen this text to {minLength} characters or more (you are currently using {n} characters)
validations.tooLong: Please shorten this text to {maxLength} characters or less (you are currently using 1 character) | Please shorten this text to {maxLength} characters or less (you are currently using {n} characters)
validations.rangeUnderflow: Value must be greater than or equal to {min}
validations.rangeOverflow: Value must be less than or equal to {max}
validations.stepMismatch: Please enter a value that is a multiple of {step}.
validations.badInput: "{value}" does not match the expected type.

typeMismatch.generic: "{value}" does not match the expected type.
typeMismatch.email: "{value}" must be a valid email address.
typeMismatch.tel: "{value}" must be a valid phone number.
